channel.title: cPanel on Carl's New Website
channel.description: Recent content in cPanel on Carl's New Website

item.title: Setting Up an SSL cetificate
item.description: While setting up this website I was constantly greeted by this in my address bar: I have no real reason for it to piss me off but it surely did. This must be remedied. My hosting is different from my registrar/DNS so accomplishing it took a little more work than it might if you have all that stuff in one place. I use namecheap as my registrar/DNS and HostPapa for my hosting (mostly because I used to use Lunarpages and they got bought by HostPapa).
